content.body: Maybe the assumption is that the majority of getter/setter implementations would be based on the receiver?
content.formatted_body: Maybe the assumption is that the majority of getter/setter implementations would be based on the receiver?

content.body: There was some discussion here recently https://es.discourse.group/t/allow-arrow-functions-getters/930/4

i mean, my personal opinion, and that of a number of styleguides, is that getters and setters are gross and should be avoided :-) that doesn't at all answer your question ofc, but it may be relevant if there were a proposal to make using getters easier.
